jwt-enabled-help: Enable JWT token-based authentication. This will gradually replace session-based authentication.
jwt-token-expiry-help: How long JWT tokens are valid in seconds. Default is 1200 (20 minutes).
jwt-remember-token-expiry-help: How long 'remember me' JWT tokens are valid in days. Default is 14 days.
session-enabled-help: Keep session-based authentication enabled for backward compatibility during migration.
session-duration-help: How long sessions are valid in seconds. Default is 1200 (20 minutes).
login-days-help: How long 'remember me' sessions are valid in days. Default is 14 days.
migration-info-text: The JWT authentication system is designed to gradually replace session-based authentication:
migration-info-step1: Enable JWT authentication while keeping sessions enabled
migration-info-step2: Users will automatically get JWT tokens when they log in
migration-info-step3: Once all users are migrated, you can disable sessions if desired
